directions.step:
I love this Banana Butter much more than the Apple Butter.
Thoroughly mash bananas; measure 4 cups into 4 to 6 quart kettle or Dutch oven. Add sugar, lemon juice, cherries, and butter; mix well. Bring to hard rolling boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat; simmer gently, uncovered, 20 minutes, stirring often. Pour into hot jars, leaving 1/2 inch headspace. Adjust lids. Process in boiling water bath (half-pints) 10 minutes. Makes 6 half-pints. Posted to recipelu-digest Volume 01 Number 188 by "Bonnie" <solomon1@kcsnet.com> on Nov 1, 1997
